alertItems.content: Severe weather: Cyclone XYZ is expected to impact the coast area. Prepare your home and businesses or check for available support.
Service Delay: Various services are experiencing delays due to the weather event.
Caretaker period: The Queensland Government is in a caretaker period until after the state election. Minimal updates will be made to this site until after the election results are declared.
